price: 58. Yallih gitih sabbatah yeerreeh dabboh yewqe mari, tohuk lakat qeebit qiddiimek hinnay sinni fidol rabe yekkeenik, diggah Yalli meqe Rizqhi keenih aceele Jannatal, kaadu diggah Yalli usuk rizqhi acuwwu haytaamak kayrih yaysi kinni.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ قُتِلُوٓاْ أَوۡ مَاتُواْ لَيَرۡزُقَنَّهُمُ ٱللَّهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hājarū fī sabīli al-lahi thumma qutilū aw mātū layarzuqannahumu al-lahu riz'qan ḥasanan wa-inna al-laha lahuwa khayru al-rāziqīna
